name: Tuesday In Hell
description:
You're dead! And since you were rather naughty in life, you've gone down to Hell. How unfortunate. Here's the worst part: Not even death can let you escape your office. Work for a devilish manager sorting letters and following instructions on your PC day after day in the hopes of getting  a ticket out of hell, but be careful not to be tempted by the manager's deals too much... Will you work hard and steady, or take a gamble for a possible shortcut to the heavens?

INSTRUCTIONS:

Use number keys 1-4 to use mailboxes

Use Mouse to press PC buttons

Use Enter, Backspace, and Spacebar when prompted to by the game

CREDITS:

Sprites by Lisa van Beurden

Game by Nicolas Perez

Circus Of Freaks by Kevin MacLeod
